intro: Myosotis welwitschii var. foliosa, commonly known as the leafy forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Boraginaceae family and is characterized by its delicate blue to purple flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun to partial shade. Its leaves are broad and lobed, contributing to its distinctive appearance. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and botanical collections.
